title: Eucyrtops
text: Eucyrtops is a <a href="genus">genus</a> of <a href="Australia">Australia</a>n <a href="Idiopidae">armored trapdoor spiders</a> that was first described by <a href="Reginald%20Innes%20Pocock">Reginald Innes Pocock</a> in 1897. it contains only two species: "<a href="Eucyrtops%20eremaeus">E. eremaeus</a>" and "<a href="Eucyrtops%20latior">E. latior</a>".
